title: Limbering up
creator_credit: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Some of Britain’s outstanding young athletes seen at practice and in action. Sprinters David Jones and Jennie Smart, diver Brian Phelps and swimmer Anita Lonsborough, are among those who show their paces; analyses points of style and movement.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
